title: Which Surahs to recite in WITR when praying as 3 rakats? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: md nephes says i watch a video of yourself where you said there are recommended sewers for witcher 3 prayers or three raka's can you tell me again and why are those recommended the prophet maintained reciting allah in the first raka why i have no idea the prophet loved these three surahs and repeatedly recited them every single night in which a prayer and allah knows best
